content: What do we live for, if it is not to make life less difficult for each other? — George Eliot
author: Zen Quotes

content: A Hero is an ordinary individual who finds the strength to persevere and endure in spite of overwhelming obstacles. — Christopher Reeve
author: Zen Quotes

content: As a matter of fact is an expression that precedes many an expression that isn't. — Laurence J. Peter
author: Zen Quotes

content: Today is plenty; right now is enough. Tomorrow will come in good time. Until it does, live the depth of now. — Ralph Marston
author: Zen Quotes

content: Anything you may hold firmly in your imagination can be yours. — William James
author: Zen Quotes

content: Remember that the best relationship is one in which your love for each other exceeds your need for each other. — Dalai Lama
author: Zen Quotes

content: Each day your life grows a day shorter. Make every move count. — Ming-Dao Deng
author: Zen Quotes

content: Life is ours to be spent, not to be saved.  — D. H. Lawrence
author: Zen Quotes

content: Faith means believing the unbelievable. — Gilbert Chesterton
author: Zen Quotes

content: Discipline is the mark of intelligent living. — Sathya Sai Baba
author: Zen Quotes

content: A day without laughter is a day wasted. — Charlie Chaplin
author: Zen Quotes

content: Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goal. — Henry Ford
author: Zen Quotes
